summary.value: Most people think they're the righteous ones. But as soon as you separate people into bad and good, Evil has already won!

system.description:
LIGHTBEARER

ALSO: Innocent, Guide, Model

It may be necessary to take up arms to defend oneself. But the real enemies of a lightbearer are cowardice, cruelty, fear, egoism and despair, which lead people to lose themselves and sink into evil.

Lightbearers are not necessarily pacifists or absolute paragons. But their heightened sense of justice makes them people of profound integrity, even when it comes to facing up to their own wrongdoings.

LIGHTBEARER FREE BENEFITS

  • Permanently increase your maximum Hit Points or Mind Points by 5 (your choice).

LIGHTBEARER SKILLS

@UUID[Compendium.fabula-ultima-homebrew.homebrew-skills.Item.JjodJOqVP5YpKeoA]{Moral Compass}

Each other player can, once per game session, highlight how their character acts, speaks or reacts in a way motivated by a strong negative emotion like cowardice, cruelty, fear, egoism or despair, and gains 1 Fabula point in doing so.

The GM then gains 1 Ultima point, which they can add to those possessed by the villain of their choice. You can choose instead to replace loyalty with mistrust, affection with hatred, or to remove an emotion from the bond you have with the character who has activated this power. If so, describe what your character sees as a disturbing change in hat other character's behavior.

@UUID[Compendium.fabula-ultima-homebrew.homebrew-skills.Item.B6xWTA00SPECQFx8]{Forgiveness} (SL2)

During a rest interlude, if you've had a conversation with someone towards whom you had an emotion of mistrust or hatred, and that emotion has disappeared or been changed, you gain 【SL】 Fabula points each.

@UUID[Compendium.fabula-ultima-homebrew.homebrew-skills.Item.NMnojsG6bR9JLaCj]{Compassion} (SL3)

When you succeed a test to fill or erase sections of a Clock by trying to appease someone's anger, fear or grief, or to force them to face up to their wrongdoing, you can spend up to 【SL × 10】 MP. For every 10 MP spent in this way, fill or erase an additional section of the Clock.

Also fill in an additional section the first time you successfully identify the reasons behind that character's actions when using this skill.

@UUID[Compendium.fabula-ultima-natural-fantasy.natural-fantasy-skills.Item.zU2ZJ9PaDAShVxsS]{Wrath} (SL5)

When attacking an enemy, you can spend 5 MP to inflict additional light damage equal to 【SL × 2】+ their number of dark traits.

@UUID[Compendium.fabula-ultima-homebrew.homebrew-skills.Item.JwGymdYdR4upQ8Lb]{Determination} (SL5)

When an attack or spell inflicts damage to you, you can reduce it by up to 【SL × The Number of Dark Traits】 of the attacker by spending the same number of MP.
